code: import{heroes}from'../data/heroes';export var getHreoesByName=function getHreoesByName(){var name=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';if(name===''){return[];}name=name.toLowerCase();return heroes.filter(function(_ref){var superhero=_ref.superhero;return superhero.toLocaleLowerCase().includes(name);});};
